content: #21090 is a refactor PR for simplicial sets. It redefines the boundary and horns in the standard simplex using the notion of subcomplex of a simplicial set (an abbreviation for the Subpresheaf API for subpresheaves of presheaves of types). This shall be quite important in the development of the homotopy theory of simplicial sets and for the infinity cosmos project.
In order to reduce a little bit the length of the diff, it depends on two quite straightforward PRs:
The refactor PR #21090 is ready for review.
